In addition, a minimum inhibitory concentration (IC 50, mg/ml) that inhibits the activity of hyaluronidase by 50% was evaluated for Examples 4 to 6 (Cultures 1 to 3). 
As shown in [Table 13] to [Table 15], the hyaluronidase inhibitory effects were excellent even at low concentrations of 1.36 mg/ml, 2.09 mg/ml and 3.99 mg/ml in Examples 4 to 6, respectively.
